General.Name: Megaron SA
General.Description: Megaron S.A. produces and sells mineral masses and mixtures in Poland and internationally. It offers gypsum coats, ready- made polymer coatings, gypsum putty products, and gypsum adhesives. It serves chemical and construction industries, and construction chemical wholesalers. The company is based in Szczecin, Poland.
General.Address: ul. Pyrzycka 3 e, f, Szczecin, Poland, 70-892
